mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCHEDULE WHERE USERID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PUT_SCHEDULE WHERE USERID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PUT_PLACE WHERE USERID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCHEDULE_REPORT WHERE USERID = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM(SELECT S.*,P.THUMBNAIL FROM SCHEDULE S INNER JOIN PLACE P ON(S.PLACENO=P.PLACENO) WHERE S.USERID=#{userId} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC)WHERE ROWNUM<=2

SELECT * FROM(SELECT S.*,P.THUMBNAIL FROM SCHEDULE S INNER JOIN PLACE P ON(S.PLACENO=P.PLACENO) INNER JOIN PUT_SCHEDULE PP ON(PP.SCHEDULENO=S.SCHEDULENO) WHERE PP.USERID=#{userId} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC)WHERE ROWNUM<=2
SELECT * FROM(SELECT P.* FROM PUT_PLACE PP INNER JOIN PLACE P ON(PP.PLACENO=P.PLACENO) WHERE PP.USERID=#{userId} AND P.USERID IS NULL ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC)WHERE ROWNUM<=2

SELECT * FROM(SELECT S.*, P.THUMBNAIL, SP.TITLE AS SPTITLE FROM SCHEDULE_REPORT SP INNER JOIN SCHEDULE S ON(SP.SCHEDULENO = S.SCHEDULENO) INNER JOIN PLACE P ON(P.PLACENO=S.PLACENO) WHERE SP.USERID=#{userId} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC)WHERE ROWNUM<=2
SELECT * FROM(SELECT S.*,P.THUMBNAIL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS TODAY FROM SCHEDULE S INNER JOIN PLACE P ON(S.PLACENO=P.PLACENO) WHERE S.USERID=#{userId} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC)

SELECT * FROM(SELECT S.*,P.THUMBNAIL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS TODAY FROM SCHEDULE S INNER JOIN PLACE P ON(S.PLACENO=P.PLACENO) WHERE S.USERID=#{userId} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) WHERE STARTDATE < TODAY AND ENDDATE<TODAY

SELECT * FROM(SELECT S.*,P.THUMBNAIL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS TODAY FROM SCHEDULE S INNER JOIN PLACE P ON(S.PLACENO=P.PLACENO) WHERE S.USERID=#{userId} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) WHERE STARTDATE <= TODAY AND TODAY<=ENDDATE

SELECT * FROM(SELECT S.*,P.THUMBNAIL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS TODAY FROM SCHEDULE S INNER JOIN PLACE P ON(S.PLACENO=P.PLACENO) WHERE S.USERID=#{userId} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) WHERE STARTDATE > TODAY AND ENDDATE>TODAY

SELECT * FROM(SELECT S.*,P.THUMBNAIL FROM SCHEDULE S INNER JOIN PLACE P ON(S.PLACENO=P.PLACENO) INNER JOIN PUT_SCHEDULE PP ON(PP.SCHEDULENO=S.SCHEDULENO) WHERE PP.USERID=#{userId} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC)
SELECT * FROM(SELECT P.* FROM PUT_PLACE PP INNER JOIN PLACE P ON(PP.PLACENO=P.PLACENO) WHERE PP.USERID=#{userId} AND P.USERID IS NULL ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC)
SELECT * FROM(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PUT_PLACE PP INNER JOIN PLACE P ON(PP.PLACENO=P.PLACENO) WHERE PP.USERID=#{userId} AND P.USERID IS NULL ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC)

SELECT * FROM(SELECT S.*, P.THUMBNAIL, SP.TITLE AS SPTITLE FROM SCHEDULE_REPORT SP INNER JOIN SCHEDULE S ON(SP.SCHEDULENO = S.SCHEDULENO) INNER JOIN PLACE P ON(P.PLACENO=S.PLACENO) WHERE SP.USERID=#{userId} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC)
